Summary: Object floated in from N, stopped and hovered momentarily,then traveled toward the east, climbed steadily and disappeared in seconds.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Binghamton
There were no other sightings in Binghamton on or around August 20th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the lawn looking at the night sky as always and a bright white orb floated in from the north about the altitude of a prop plane. No sound, no blinking or colorful lights. It started moving towards the east after a minute, stopped and hovered for a few seconds.I said in my mind-There you guys are. What are you up to again?(I see them quite a lot lately.Then it took off to the east, floating gradually faster, climbing slightly, and speeding up slowly, then disappeared.Clear night, no planes in the area. Strange, because I see lots of them all over(this is a corridor and I'm on top of a mountain. I can see a large part of the sky, and it's rural, so there's not much light pollution.
